cryptochat module¶

Overview¶

This is the main module for GatorChat. All you need to do to run GatorChat is create an instance of CryptoChat and call start() from the main method of your program

class cryptochat.CryptoChat¶

Bases: object

The main class that runs the progrm

create_chat()¶

This method attempts to establish a connection a host that is currently hosting a chat

create_profile()¶

method that creates a profile

decrypt_profile()¶

This function is responsible for taking in the passphrase of the user in order to decrypt their profile. Deletes a profile after the max number of login attempts has been reached

determine_action()¶

Determines which action to take. Options are create or load a profile

get_connection_info()¶

returns a tuple of the loaded profile data’s connection info

get_files()¶

Collects the profiles in the ‘profile’ directory. Exits the program if the dir does not exist

get_str_value(prompt)¶

Gets a string value from the console using the specified prompt

Parameters

{string} -- the prompt to display (prompt) –

Returns

stirng1 – collected string

host_new_chat()¶

Method to host a new chat. Takes in a desired password and waits for connections

load_profile()¶

Starts the load profile process and monitors its stats

run_loop()¶

The main loop of the program

select_profile()¶

Prints out the available profiles and prompts the user to pick one. Once selected it decrypts the profile and sets the profile data for this session If no profiles are found it starts the create a profile process

start()¶

Starts the program. Collects the profile files and determines the action to take
